comments: Number of nilpotent n X n matrices over GF(4).(-1)^n * resultant of the Chebyshev polynomial of first kind of degree n and Chebyshev polynomial of first kind of degree 2n (cf. A039991). - _Benoit Cloitre_, Jan 26 2003
references: N. J. Fine and I. N. Herstein, The probability that a matrix be nilpotent, Illinois J. Math., 2 (1958), 499-504.
M. Gerstenhaber, On the number of nilpotent matrices with coefficients in a finite field. Illinois J. Math., Vol. 5 (1961), 330-333.
author: Stephen G. Penrice (spenrice(AT)ets.org), Mar 29 2000
extensions: More terms from _James A. Sellers_, Apr 08 2000
